body:
Hello Avicus community, this is JCostas380.

I have recently created a simple and small JS script for tampermonkey and similar that simply reloads the page. This is useful in my opinion because if you have a dual-monitor screen you can see minecraft in one while see your live stats in the other.

The link for this simple tool is: https://gist.github.com/JCostas380/8b192888d12e81fd38d622cd94c62434
Hope you like it :D
